mapper.sql: ID, DATE_KEY, ORG_CODE, PL_CODE, PL_NAME, PP_CODE, PP_NAME, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, MAX_XS_AMT, MIN_XS_AMT, XS_DD, M_JC_QTY
mapper.select:
SELECT ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_NAME, M_JC_QTY, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, MAX_XS_AMT, MIN_XS_AMT, XS_DD, (@rowNum :=@rowNum + 1) AS rowNo FROM ( SELECT ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_NAME, M_JC_QTY, SUM(XS_AMT) AS XS_AMT, SUM(XS_QTY) AS XS_QTY, MAX(MAX_XS_AMT) AS MAX_XS_AMT, MIN(MIN_XS_AMT) AS MIN_XS_AMT, SUM(XS_DD) AS XS_DD FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail
GROUP BY PROD_CODE ORDER BY XS_AMT DESC,id DESC limit #{pager.pageOffset},#{pager.rows} ) b, (SELECT(@rowNum := 0)) c

SELECT ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_NAME, M_JC_QTY, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, MAX_XS_AMT, MIN_XS_AMT, XS_DD, (@rowNum :=@rowNum + 1) AS rowNo FROM ( SELECT ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_NAME, M_JC_QTY, SUM(XS_AMT) AS XS_AMT, SUM(XS_QTY) AS XS_QTY, MAX(MAX_XS_AMT) AS MAX_XS_AMT, MIN(MIN_XS_AMT) AS MIN_XS_AMT, SUM(XS_DD) AS XS_DD FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail
GROUP BY PROD_CODE ORDER BY XS_AMT ASC,id ASC limit #{pager.pageOffset},#{pager.rows} ) b, (SELECT(@rowNum := 0)) c

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT
FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail
GROUP BY PROD_CODE) a

SELECT PROD_NAME, PROD_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_NAME, M_JC_QTY, SUM(XS_AMT) AS XS_AMT, SUM(XS_QTY) AS XS_QTY, MAX(MAX_XS_AMT) AS MAX_XS_AMT, MIN(MIN_XS_AMT) AS MIN_XS_AMT, SUM(XS_DD) AS XS_DD FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail
GROUP BY PROD_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT
FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail ) a
SELECT DISTINCT PP_CODE, PP_NAME FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail WHERE PL_CODE = #{plCode} ORDER BY PP_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT PL_CODE, PL_NAME FROM hty_fct_sale_org_detail ORDER BY PL_CODE

select
from hty_fct_sale_org_detail where ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} order by YEAR_MON desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into hty_fct_sale_org_detail (ID, DATE_KEY, ORG_CODE, PL_CODE, PL_NAME, PP_CODE, PP_NAME, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, MAX_XS_AMT, MIN_XS_AMT, XS_DD, M_JC_QTY ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mJcQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

ID,

mapper.update:
update hty_fct_sale_org_detail
DATE_KEY = #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PL_CODE = #{plCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PL_NAME = #{plName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PP_CODE = #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PP_NAME = #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_CODE = #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XS_AMT = #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_QTY = #{xsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_XS_AMT = #{maxXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIN_XS_AMT = #{minXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_DD = #{xsDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
M_JC_QTY = #{mJcQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update hty_fct_sale_org_detail set DATE_KEY = #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PL_CODE = #{plCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PL_NAME = #{plName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PP_CODE = #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PP_NAME = #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_CODE = #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XS_AMT = #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_QTY = #{xsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAX_XS_AMT = #{maxXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MIN_XS_AMT = #{minXsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_DD = #{xsDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, M_JC_QTY = #{mJcQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
